categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Nubarron was a Jedi Master of an unidentified species who served as the Shipmaster and quartermaster of Starlight Beacon during the High Republic Era. An amorphous being who resembled a cloud and was capable of generating their own lightning, Master Nubarron could only communicate telepathically with other Force-users. Their coloring shifted with their emotions and included lavender when calm, pink-and-purple when displeased, and scarlet when growing more heated. When the Jedi was not hovering, they had a tall cylindrical jar they could sink into.

Due to Jedi Knight Vernestra Rwoh's habit of crashing starships she was assigned, Nubarron refused to let her use any more of their starships. They were frustrated that Rwoh had lost a Vector to the Nihil, and that she had promised to return a particular junk hauler in reasonable condition, but she instead completely destroyed the Varonchagger when she crashed during the attack on Valo. Afterward, Nubarron ordered a ban on issuing any ships to Rwoh.
